bug.summary: [BUG] when starting webui through chromeium command line, stuck on loading.
bug.description: current hardware is, raspberry pi 4 with 5in touch display connected using adafruit dpi hat. i have the pi boot into desktop mode and open chromium using this command. chromium-browser --disable-infobars --kiosk "<denchmark-link:http://username:password@localhost:8080>http://username:password@localhost:8080</denchmark-link> " chromium will launch just fine and go to the url, but it gets stuck on a loading circle in the middle of the screen, <denchmark-link:https://i.imgur.com/zrc7KZ8.png>https://i.imgur.com/zrc7KZ8.png</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: found a sorta ok workaround, if i save the creds in chrome and remove the username and password from the command, it will start and you just have to hit ok to login
